title: Flexible Language Curriculum Utilizing Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) and Mobile Messengers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Fundamental Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Multimodal curriculum optimized for limited data environments and mobile device accessibility, designed to enable language learning continuity in low-cost/low-data settings

learning_goals: Students acquire at least five language expressions per week using text/audio/image-based materials provided via mobile messenger (Telegram).
Students demonstrate language application skills by completing at least four weekly projects in a non-real-time online environment.
At the end of the course, over 80% of students maintain learning persistence by utilizing data optimization strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
